text: Ramón Da Silva Costa (born February 27, 1992 in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil) is a professional Brazilian footballer who currently plays for Cafetaleros de Tapachula. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1992 births Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Nova Iguaçu Futebol Clube players Category:Cafetaleros de Chiapas footballers Category:Sociedade Esportiva e Recreativa Caxias do Sul players Category:Clube Atlético Juventus players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série D players Category:Ascenso MX players Category:Malaysia Super League players Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Mexico Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Malaysia Category:Expatriate footballers in Mexico Category:Expatriate footballers in Malaysia
title: Ramón da Silva Costa
